caption.p: A, Bayesian skyline plot of the SARS‐CoV‐2 outbreak. The y‐axis indicates Ne and x‐axis shows the time in year units (0 = 30 January; 18.2 days; 36.5 days; 54.7 days; and 73 days before). The thick solid line represents the median value of the estimates, and the gray area the 95% HPD. B, Birth‐death skyline plot of the SARS‐CoV‐2 outbreak allowing two R e intervals. The curve and the orange area show the mean R e values and their 95% confidence intervals. The y and x‐axes, respectively, represent R values and time in days. HPD, highest posterior density
